# Load these modules on the login node before building/running:
#
# - apptainer        # container runtime + build support
# - cuda/12.2        # matches the base image in env/apptainer.def
# - nsight-systems   # CLI tracer used when PROFILER=nsys
# - gcc/11           # toolchain for any native extensions

apptainer
cuda/12.2
nsight-systems
gcc/11
